title: Bubba Loses A Crown & Celine Dion Loses Her Mind | Daily Best of May 19 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Bubba has to leave when he loses a crown on his tooth while we are live on the air. Celine Dion has lost her mind as she launches her gender-neutral infant and children clothing line. A man celebrates eating two Big Macs every day for for fifty years. And Nick Saban claims Texas A&M is abusing the new NIL deal system in college athletics.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
